long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Random Group Generator extension is a versatile and user-friendly tool designed to simplify the process of dividing a list of names into random groups. Whether you're organizing team-building activities, selecting partners for a project, or distributing tasks fairly, this extension offers a quick and efficient solution.

Features:

- Easy Input: Enter the list of names in a convenient text area, with one name per line.

- Custom Group Size: Define the number of groups you want to create by simply adjusting the number input field. The default is set to 2 groups.

- Generate Random Groups: Click the "GENERATE" button, and the extension will automatically divide the names into random groups according to your specified group size. The extension employs a random allocation algorithm to ensure fairness and unpredictability.

- Group Visualization: The generated groups are presented in a clear and organized manner. Each group is displayed within a labeled box, with a title "Group X," where X represents the group number. The group members are listed in an ordered list for easy reference.

- Data Persistence: The extension saves the entered names to local storage, allowing you to access previously used lists and resume your work seamlessly.

- Clear Functionality: If you need to start over or clear the current list, simply click the "Clear" button, and the text area will be emptied, while the stored names are removed from local storage.

Whether you're a teacher creating random teams for a class project or an event planner organizing attendees into groups, the Random Group Generator Chrome browser extension is a valuable tool to streamline the process and ensure an equitable distribution of participants. Save time and effort with this easy-to-use extension, and enjoy the benefits of a transparent and randomized grouping system.

For more information and to install the Random Group Generator Chrome browser extension.
